Description/Function: Kelvar mesh in skin, provides SP vs. most damage
Effect/Modifier: SP: 2–20 by grade, slight ATTR loss, some nerve deadening
Maintenance_Interval/Failure_Mode: Reweave after major weight change, no full coverage

Description/Function: Kevlar weave on tendons, bone reinforcement, spinal shielding
Effect/Modifier: +2 BOD, +1 STR, +1 MA, ignore up to 50% blunt trauma

Description/Function: Next-gen version: more efficient nanites, tougher weave
Effect/Modifier: +3 BOD, +2 MA, near immunity to blunt trauma
Maintenance_Interval/Failure_Mode: Treatment must be repeated after major trauma

Description/Function: Nanite rebuild of auditory system, grants Enhanced Hearing, Level Damper
Effect/Modifier: Enhanced Hearing, Level Damper (as cyberaudio options), temporary deafness

Description/Function: Artificial lungs, improved oxygen use, enhanced breath holding
Effect/Modifier: Double breath time, half breath rate
Maintenance_Interval/Failure_Mode: No major side effects, common among nomads, spacers

Description/Function: Ambidextrous nerve graft, connects both brain hemispheres
Maintenance_Interval/Failure_Mode: 4 weeks at half skill in new “off” hand

Description/Function: Adds extra joints for extended flexibility
Effect/Modifier: +2 REF/MA athletic/grapple, -5 penalty for one week, temp loss on fumble
Maintenance_Interval/Failure_Mode: Lose use of limb on MA/REF fumble (1D10 rounds)

Effect/Modifier: Reinforced hips/ribs, Smoothflow hydraulics, hardened joints, modular add-ons

Description/Function: Allows cyberfingers to be installed on meat hands
Effect/Modifier: Provides cyberfinger slots on organic hands

Description/Function: Holds a single 5mm round in tip, concealed in finger
Maintenance_Interval/Failure_Mode: May use alternate ammo, black-market in some regions

Description/Function: Colonies of nanites to heal, repair, resist disease, regrow tissue
Effect/Modifier: Heal REC in Hits per 60s, +2 REF/DEX, +4 CON vs. disease/poison, auto-limb regrowth

Description/Function: Full-body cyborg conversion, parallel processing, supercomputer mind, net integration
Effect/Modifier: Multiple INT actions, 40+ MU storage, built-in cybermodem, superhuman programming
Power/Install_Requirement: Requires complete replacement and neural integration
